mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jnl01_journal ( jnl01_cont_id, jnl01_seq, jnl01_dr_acnt_cd, jnl01_dr_amt, jnl01_cr_acnt_cd, jnl01_cr_amt) VALUES ( #{jnl01ContId},#{jnl01Seq},#{jnl01DrAcntCd},#{jnl01DrAmt},#{jnl01CrAcntCd},#{jnl01CrAmt})
mapper.update: UPDATE jnl01_journal SET jnl01_cont_id = #{jnl01ContId} , /** 체결ID */ jnl01_seq = #{jnl01Seq} , /** 순번 */ jnl01_dr_acnt_cd = #{jnl01DrAcntCd} , /** 차변계정코드 */ jnl01_dr_amt = #{jnl01DrAmt} , /** 차변금액 */ jnl01_cr_acnt_cd = #{jnl01CrAcntCd} , /** 대변계정코드 */ jnl01_cr_amt = #{jnl01CrAmt} /** 대변금액 */ WHERE 1=1 AND jnl01_cont_id = #{jnl01ContId} AND jnl01_seq = #{jnl01Seq}
